article.headline: Lehigh 60, Colgate 59
article.story: BETHLEHEM, Pa. (AP) -- Jose Olivero scored 20 points and hit a crucial free throw in the final seconds to lead Lehigh to a 60-59 victory over Colgate on Wednesday. Kyle Neptune added 11 points and Phil Anderson added 10 for Lehigh (8-12, 3-1 Patriot League). Jon Simon scored 28 points for Colgate (6-11, 1-3) and Kendall Chones added 12. Olivero contributed five of his 15 first-half points as Lehigh jumped out to a 15-2 lead. The Mountain Hawks had a 30-23 lead at the half and stretched the margin to 13 points with 15:24 remaining on a jumper by Hall. Colgate chipped away and pared the edge to six points on a 3-pointer by Kyle Chones at the 11:05 mark, but Lehigh scored eight unanswered points with 3-pointers from Neptune and Hall to go ahead 52-38 with 9:24 to go. Colgate again battled back, and a 3-pointer from Simon cut the margin to three points with two seconds to go. But Olivero sank a free throw to put Lehigh up by four, and the Mountain Hawks retained a single-point edge after Simon hit another three from near midcourt at the buzzer.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
